item.description:
WELLNESS DAY
Join us at Look at Me Now on April 13th from 12:00 to 4:00p.m.
Sample our raw food delicasies, get in touch with your inner self, set goals for your future, and learn how to de-stress and much, much more! We look forward to spending a day of wellness and education with you.

EVENTS
All Day - Chair Massage $1/minute
12-12:15 - Meditation-Complimentary
12:15 - 12:45 p.m - Energy work Demo - Complimentary
12-1 p.m. - Raw Food Prep Demo - Complimentary
1-2:30 p.m. - Vision Boards - Complimentary
1-4 p.m. - Intuitive Readings $10 for 15 minutes
3-4 p.m. - Swedish Massage Demo - Complimentary


http://weightloss.mee...

weightloss.meetup.com/463/calendar/7580124/

This is the same location as Saturday, April 12 th Meet Up.
So if can cannot go to Saturday's Wellness Meet Up then
Maybe you can come to this Meet Up.
item.how_to_find_us: Lori Larsen is the POC for this Meet Up - I may be in the middle of an event when you arrive, just introduce yourself at the smoothie bar.
item.why: Hey, they have a smoothie bar.
item.name: More Coffee and Wellness in West Haven
